          LUC:          931
           Size       5,000 SF

  Average Maximum Parking Demand:
               Weekday:       10.6 vehicles per 1,000 SF
                Saturday:     16.4 vehicles per 1,000 SF

                 Weekday:        9.5 vehicles per 1,000 SF X      5,000 SF =      48 vehicles
                 Saturday:      14.8 vehicles per 1,000 SF X      5,000 SF =      74 vehicles
